content.html: As someone in the “don’t have anything nice to say” camp about today’s tech controversy, I’m indeed not saying anything (rightly) other than: It’s not okay either to demand respect for joining a company that has done highly questionable things.
content.value:
As someone in the “don’t have anything nice to say” camp about today’s tech controversy, I’m indeed not saying anything (rightly)  other than:

It’s not okay either to demand respect for joining a company that has done highly questionable things.
